tech_specs.\u2022 Watch Movement: Miyota Japanese quartz 3 hand movement and crown placement at 3 o’clock.
tech_specs.\u2022 Watch Dial: The dial features bold printed hour indices and a stamped seconds track.
tech_specs.\u2022 Watch Case: 40mm, 50 meter/5 ATM custom stainless steel case, hardened mineral crystal, double gasket crown, stainless steel screw down caseback, and spring pin lugs.
tech_specs.\u2022 Watch Band: 20-18mm tapered custom genuine leather strap with custom solid stainless steel buckle closure.
tech_specs.\u2022 Warranty: Nixon offers a limited warranty on defects in materials and workmanship for a period of two (2) years after you have taken physical possession of the watch from nixon.com or an authorized Nixon dealer. We also want to make sure we get your watch fixed if you encounter any problems with it, so we guarantee that we will keep sufficient spare parts to repair or replace it for two (2) years. This means that if the materials in your watch aren't right or if the watch isn't put together correctly, we'll repair or replace it, at our discretion. But, this doesn't mean you can abuse your watch and expect us to fix it for free.
